preqs: (FIT9131 or FIT9133 or FIT5131 or FIT9017) and (FIT9132 or FIT5132 or FIT9003 or FIT9019)) or equivalent

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {2402.[5-6], 2411, 2423, 3341.2, 3348.1, 3349} Do true Otherwise (Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT5131, FIT9017, FIT9131, FIT9133} and  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT5132, FIT9003, FIT9019, FIT9132} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS})

description: This unit presents students with the theory and practice underlying computerised information retrieval. Topics covered include: history and context of information retrieval systems, retrieval models, Boolean, vector space and probabilistic, evaluation strategies, test collections, web search engines, indexing, content-based multimedia retrieval and relevance feedback.
